did.unittitle: Ledger of Whiting & Paynegeneral store in Falmouth, Stafford County, Virginia

scopecontent.p: Whiting and Payne written in another hand, Thomas Whiting and Payne scribbled over. No index.

did.unittitle: Journal of Whiting & Payne(on spine) of Fauquier County, Virginia

scopecontent.p:
Several Payne signatures inside. Names include Robert H. Payneand John M. Whiting. Accounts with
Staffordstore. Names repeated often include Baldwin Bradfordand George Kizer.

did.unittitle: Personal letters, business correspondence, deeds and receipts of Joshua Ruffner, Jesse Ruffnerand Kateand Dora Payneof Faquier County, Va.
Ledger of a [house furnishings wholesale firm] trading in Fairfax, Loudounand Prince WilliamCounties, Virginia

scopecontent.p: Loudoun Manufacturing Companyis a creditor (page 215). Other firm names appear as creditors, though most sales appear to be to individuals. Index.
